GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.28 to before v4.9.333
GSD.description:
net: mdio: fix undefined behavior in bit shift for __mdiobus_register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.333 by commit 20ed01a7b9af6e6a3c33761eebbb710ea6dd49b7, it was introduced in version v2.6.28 by commit 4fd5f812c23c7deee6425f4a318e85c317cd1d6c. For more details please see the references link.
